So... CSGO.
I've played CSGO for many many years, and there isn't much to say about it that has not been said.
I'd like to say a few words regarding how amazing I believe the game is... to start off...
Ok Valve employees are asleep, I can actually talk now. The game is utterly shit in regards to what it used to be before it went Free To Play. The game has been continuously trashed over and over by hackers and Valve's utter negligence. The Trust Factor matchmaking system does not reward skillful players because of the high likelihood of being reported by either enemies who bring out every cm2 of salt.
The game used to be good, it used to be fun. There's still a chance it could be fun in the future if you seclude your matchmaking time.
Nevertheless, it's trash now. Wanna know another reason why? I'm writing this review on my smurf. Yeah, Valve plz fix.
This game is litty and toxic. 10/10

The hacking has recently gone down, so that's pretty nice.

Edit:  Randomly started to get queued with new profiles (my profile is like 14 years old).  New profiles are hackers, smurfs, or new players who have no idea what they are doing.  So much for prime.  In the current state, I have to change my review to not recommend.
